Name: Testing
Description: For development and testing your integration, we provide a Pseudo language translation. The language code for Pseudo language is xx-xx. Use English (en) as source language and Pseudo language as target language and the order will be processed for free. Instead of actual translation, you will get your source text reversed (e.g. "Hello" -> "olleH"). Placing Pseudo language orders is useful for testing the whole process from end to end and, depending on your use case, possibly also for pinpointing any non-translated parts on your end.

Name: Callbacks
Description: Callbacks will be explained on this page soon.
